Description: Project's target framework(s) needs to be changed
Snippet: Current target framework: net9.0 Recommended target framework: net10.0

builder.Services.AddHttpClient("workflow", client =>  {      var urls = builder.Configuration.GetValue<string>("ASPNETCORE_URLS");      var defaultHost = "localhost";      var defaultPort = 7105;        // Check if ASPNETCORE_URLS contains a full URL, and extract the host if so      var uriBuilder = new UriBuilder      {          Scheme = "https",          Host = defaultHost,          Port = builder.Configuration.GetValue("ASPNETCORE_HTTPS_PORT", defaultPort),          Path = "api/"      };        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(urls))      {          if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(urls))          {              try              {                  var firstUrl = urls.Split(';').FirstOrDefault();                  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(firstUrl))                  {                      var uri = new Uri(firstUrl);                      uriBuilder.Host = uri.Host;                      uriBuilder.Port = uri.Port;                  }              }              catch (UriFormatException ex)              {                  Log.Error(ex, "Error parsing ASPNETCORE_URLS");              }          }      }      client.BaseAddress = uriBuilder.Uri;  });
